Information From the Restaurant Offers
Description: Filippo's Pizza&Broasted Chicken is a Pizza , American , and Fast Food restaurant where most Menuism users came for a meal on the go , paid less than $10 , and tipped less than 15% . Tags: Pizza, American, Fast Food, Sandwiches, and Subs Stats: 4 dishes entered by diners at Filippo's Pizza&Broasted Chicken

Reviews for Filippo's Pizza&Broasted Chicken Write a review 4 reviews First reviewed by Shughart
1 helpful votes over 2 reviews Romeo 2 Restaurant Reviews +1
Add as friend Send Msg Filippo's Pizza&Broasted Chicken Romeo July 7, 2008 5.0 5.0 star rating +1 0 +1 1 Votes Pizza&Broasted Chicken
Had their pizza and broasted chicken sent to my office for a client meeting. They delivered and it was great. I’ve had many different kinds before and keep going only to Filippo’s on 124th. That was 4 years ago and I still order for the office and take it home for the family. Outstanding.
Dishes I tried:
Pizza
5.0 star rating
Tasty. Good crust. Great sauce. Good value.
Broasted Chicken
5.0 star rating
I usually don’t like fried chicken (like KFC ), but their season broasted chicken is awsome. Link To Review
Copy
Add a Comment
Comments
What do you think? Reply or write your own review . Reply: Login or join with Facebook to reply to this restaurant review. Login to Reply 0 helpful votes over 3 reviews JimmyTimmy 3 Restaurant Reviews 0
Add as friend Send Msg Filippo's Pizza&Broasted Chicken JimmyTimmy August 10, 2009 1.0 1.0 star rating 0 0 0 0 Votes Disappointing
As a pizza lover, I was very upset with my experience. Food was okay, pick-up area was disgusting, customer service was horrible, and prices aren’t that great. Considering the large amount of pizza places in the area (Glass Nickel, Lalli’s, Toppers) you would expect great service and competitive prices… not at Filipo’s.
I will never go there again – very sad to see a family-run place get run into the ground. Clean up your act (both literally and figuratively) and lower your prices and maybe I’ll return. Link To Review

Okay food coupled with awful customer service
Bad experience from call-in through dinner. Customer service was horrible, pick-up was very dirty (nervous about food prep), and okay food.
Nothing about the place is very pleasing and considering the environment that they cook in, I…
